ModMetaData.name: Easier Kibble + x4 Recipe [1.3-1.5]
ModMetaData.author: GoldenLumia, Helmotz(Original)
ModMetaData.description: I like the easier kibble mod. This just adds that as a x4 recipe. Due to the 1.5 update, I have moved the original recipe into this mod as well until the original creator updates their mod.
